posts.post_content:
Hi all, I am looking to sell my T217 Mono Cigarette cards.   I am accepting PayPal, check, or money order for these.  Prices  are net to me, so please add 3% for regular PayPal.  Domestic shipping  is on me.  Shipping to other countries, I will work with you on price.


Ivan Howard, SGC 35, $[STRIKE]1050[/STRIKE]Sold
Hughie Smith Fielding, SGC 10, [STRIKE]$375[/STRIKE]$325Sold

 
Additional scans available on request.  Thanks, and feel free to e-mail any questions: [URL="skeltone@rocketmail.com"]skeltone@rocketmail.com[/URL].
  
First commitment to buy will go before ongoing negotiations.
